name: Pain d'Epice (Spice Bread)
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons ground mixed spices, such as anise, cinnamon, cloves and cardamom, ginger, nutmeg and pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 300°F and grease a loaf pan with butter.

Place the sugar, honey, and baking soda in a large pan with generous 1/3 cup water. Melt over low heat, stirring. Remove from the heat and let cool a little before stirring in the flour, orange zest, and spices. Half-fill the prepared loaf pan with the batter.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 1 1/2 hours.
